{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$13.4M in 2021-2022** on contracts with SOUTHWEST RESEARCH INSTITUTE.

Across 15 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 2 have at least one amendment (13%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was -19% and the average number of amendments was 1. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$40.8K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1.19 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$6.1M. The longest contract was 7.93 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$57.5M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
